text: Ambition is a lostThe Library of Congress/FIAF American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog: Ambition 1916 American silent drama film directed by James Vincent and starring Yiddish theatre star Bertha Kalich. It was produced and distributed by the Fox Film Corporation. Tooker as John Moore *W. W.
